channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Number of fish species at risk of extinction fivefold higher than previous estimates, according to a new prediction

item.title: NSF invests in BioFoundries to drive advances across science and engineering

item.title: Ancient gene gives spiders their narrow waist
item.description: An ancient gene is crucial for the development of the distinctive waist that divides the spider body plan in two, according to a new study.
